data.sentence: The word فَهُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)

data.meanings: To be diseased/disordered, distempered, to be ill or sick, languid or weak or feeble, deficient in strength, defective or deficient, to be right or nearly right (in judgement or opinion).
data.sentence: The word مَرِضْتُ comes from the root م ر ض and is associated with the meanings: To be diseased/disordered, distempered, to be ill or sick, languid or weak or feeble, deficient in strength, defective or deficient, to be right or nearly right (in judgement or opinion).

data.meanings: to cure, quench, restore to health. shifa - recovery, remedy, healing.
data.sentence: The word يَشْفِينِ comes from the root ش ف ي and is associated with the meanings: to cure, quench, restore to health. shifa - recovery, remedy, healing.
